location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description (used for referencing) commences at f 66, and terminates at f 70, as it is part of a larger physical volume; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: Thefile contains papers regarding the 1914 oil concession granted to the TurkishPetroleum Company, which became the Iraq Petroleum Company in 1929. The primarycorrespondent is H P W Giffard, Petroleum Department, Board of Trade.
